mapper.insert:
SELECT NVL((MAX(postId)+1),0) FROM post
INSERT INTO post (boardId, postId, title, writer, content, ip, hit, file_cnt) VALUES ( #{boardId}, #{postId}, #{title}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{ip}, 0, 0)
mapper.select:
SELECT post.postId, post.title, post.writer, post.hit, post.file_cnt, post.date_Write, mem.nickname AS writernick FROM post, ( SELECT id, nickname FROM member UNION SELECT id, nick AS nickname FROM member_kakao) mem
WHERE post.boardId=#{boardId} AND post.writer=mem.id ORDER BY post.date_write DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM post WHERE boardId=#{boardId} AND postId=#{postId}
